full_summary:
___
**ISSP Next Generation EUD 3.0**
=====================================================

### Solicitation Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | W8476-249449/A |
| Reference Number | PW-__QD-030-29256 |
| Amendment Number | 0 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-02-13T14:00:00 |
| Tender Status | Expiré (Expired) |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) |
| Procurement Method | Concurrentielle - ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding) |

### Description of the Acquisition

The Government of Canada intends to acquire and support the next generation of End User Devices for the Integrated Soldier System (ISS) Operator and Supporter, under the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)][1].

### Notice Type and Method of Procurement

*   **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
*   **Method of Procurement**: Concurrentielle - ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
*   **Trade Agreement**: Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
*   **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement**: Non

### Requirements and Scope of Work

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Delivery will be made in Quebec (except Ottawa-Gatineau) and Alberta.

Documents submitted in either official language of Canada are accepted.

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Person**: Xiao, Tanya
*   **Phone**: (873) 355-1225
*   **Email**: [tanya.xiao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.xiao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
